Ramhorn/Koga Shuko/Unitron/Anubis/Hades:



Koga Shuko nodded, as Unitron laughed, walking, stopping next to Shuko.


Shuko threw Ramhorn forward at Luna Prine.  "Take your pathetic piece of 
scrap."
Activating his com, he spoke into it.  "Blastrage and BH, pull out.  Meet us 
at our base, Shuko out."

Shuko, Unitron, Anubis, and Hades headed back for their base, weapons ready 
just in case.
